remixlab.dandelion.core

Class MatrixStackHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.dandelion.core.MatrixHelper
      • remixlab.dandelion.core.MatrixStackHelper

  • public class MatrixStackHelper
extends MatrixHelper
    Complete implementation of MatrixHelper which attaches to it a projection matrix stack and a modelview matrix stack.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(float angle)
        Description copied from class: MatrixHelper
        Two dimensional rotation.

        Same as rotateZ (this is identical to a 3D rotation along the z-axis) but included for clarity. It'd be weird for people drawing 2D graphics to be using rotateZ. And they might kick our a-- for the confusion. Additional background.

        Overrides:
        rotate in class MatrixHelper

      • scale

        public void scale(float sx,
         float sy)
        Description copied from class: MatrixHelper
        Scale in X and Y. Equivalent to scale(sx, sy, 1).

        Not recommended for use in 3D, because the z-dimension is just scaled by 1, since there's no way to know what else to scale it by.

        Overrides:
        scale in class MatrixHelper
